actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide a program of tax adjustment for small business and for persons engaged in small business.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction for new investments in the taxpayer's trade or business. Limits the deduction to $40,000 or 20 percent of the business' net income, whichever is less.

titles.title: A bill to provide a program of tax adjustment for small business and for persons engaged in small business.
